attributes.action: Remove the first past the post system in the general election
attributes.additional_details: In the last general election reform uk gained 5 seats however liberal Democrats relied less votes but gained so many more seats this is not a fair system and doesn't represent the uk
attributes.background: I want the government to remove the first past the post system as I this not a fair representation of the views of the British public

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700109
